row.name: UC4RB_TC_FAIL_IF_NOT_RUNNING#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_TC_FAIL_IF_NOT_RUNNINGs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Fail if not running" tooltip="Boolean value specifying whether the job should fail in case the server is not running." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Fail if not running</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_TC_FAIL_IF_NOT_RUNNINGs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Boolean value specifying whether the job should fail in case the server is not running.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup>
